purpose: The email announces the Nineteenth International Tbilisi Summer School in Logic and Language, scheduled to take place from September 4th to 7th, 2025, at Kutaisi International University in Georgia. It provides details about the event, including co-located events such as JELIA 2025 and TbiLLC 2025, and lists the lecturers and topics that will be covered. Additionally, it mentions that registration is free and provides information about an excursion and dinner for registered participants.
